newsitem.title: CHINA: M.LYNCH LAUNCHES WARRANTS ON HK PROPERTY STOCKS.
newsitem.headline: M.LYNCH LAUNCHES WARRANTS ON HK PROPERTY STOCKS.

text.p: Merrill Lynch International & Co C.V. said on Wednesday it launched 1.3 billion American style call warrants on a basket of property stocks.
Concord Land Development Co Ltd 0.052 shrs
Beijing North Star Co Ltd 0.150 shrs
China Resources Beijing Land Ltd 0.100 shrs
Nam Fong International Holdings Ltd 0.075 shrs
GOVERNING LAW HONG KONG LISTING DATE 03.SEPT.97
NOTE PHYSICAL OR CASH SETTLEMENT AT ISSUER'S
